## Objective

This document contains the primary analysis routines for the PARTNER study (ME Hackney, PI).

## Demographics

```{r, results='asis'}
# load data
source("R/load.R")
# create table
demo_tab = arsenal::tableby(~.,baseline_data |>
                              select(age,sex,moca_total) |> 
                              rename(Age = age, Sex = sex, MoCA = moca_total)) |>
  summary(digits=1)
demo_tab
```
